Game.Name: 2 Game Pack! - Matchbox Missions - Emergency Response & Air, Land and Sea Rescue (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: Pilot a Fire Department Helicopter or a Marine Patrol Police Boat. Be a life-saving Paramedic racing to the hospital! Rescue people from raging fires and rising waters, and save the day! When you get the call, will you be a hero?Play as either a Police or Suspect in this great chase game set in MATCHBOX County. Four different terrains provide a varied and colorful backdrop to this fun and exciting 3D pursuit!http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/936491.html
